title: How to describe someone who thinks a lot - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you describe someone who thinks a lot? That depends on what they are thinking about? However, I’ve noticed a lot of people are doers without using common sense in the process. I mean they ought to think before they re-act to situations so they can clearly make the best choice in whatever challenges they may be confronted. That’s why thinking thinks out plus the consequences can mean good decisions made.
“I've thought about what you said, so I won't speak about what I'm thinking.”-TB As someone who tends to over analyze, please don't under analyze my quote…
